document_data.name: Garavan
document_data.mainbody: '''Garavan''' was a [[Netherese]] tinkerer and the creator of the ''[[Light Pump]]''.
document_data.Abilities: Garavan's skill with tinkering and technology was extremely surprising. He had at least one [[ruby]] cut to his specifications, strongly implying he did not cut [[gem]]s himself.
document_data.Possessions: Of note, Garavan created the ''Light Pump''.
document_data.Activities: Garavan was a tinkerer who dabbled in forgotten arcane lore.
document_data.History: When [[Myshella]] was attacked by a [[phaerimm]]-created antimagic [[stone juggernaut]], Garavan, an inhabitant of the city, devised a weapon meant to destroy the construct: the ''Light Pump''. The parts were built to his specifications.
